name: Yosh Eat Bean 2
description:
Yosh is back into bean eatin action!

Eat 2+3 bean variations and read trough over 10 different text boxes in this thing!

features:

  • Voice acted by 8BitAnt

  • Has 5 beans (2 of them are specil)
  • over 15 different phrases!
  • funni
